meanings.sent1: The aurated crown sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her aurated necklace complemented her outfit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The aurated cake looked too fancy to eat.
meanings.sent4: The aurated sky at sunset painted a breathtaking scene.
meanings.sent5: The aurated leaves on the tree shimmered like tiny stars.

meanings.definition: Having a gold color or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The aurated frame added elegance to the painting.
meanings.sent2: The aurated sunset reflected on the calm lake.
meanings.sent3: His aurated shoes were the talk of the party.
meanings.sent4: The aurated fields stretched out like a golden carpet.
meanings.sent5: The aurated glow of the fire warmed the room.
